item.description: In the following mind map, I attempted to visualize some core concepts of MCP - Model Context Protocol MCP - Model Context Protocol mind map MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map illustrates basic concepts Figure 1: MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map visualizing basic concepts Download the mind map in multiple formats: MindMap PNG MindMap JPG MindMap SVG
